title: What is a scale?
content: A scale is a sequence of musical notes arranged in ascending or descending order. The most common scale is the C Major Scale: C – D – E – F – G – A – B. Click the button below to hear the scale.

title: Major vs Minor Chords
content: Major chord = Root + major 3rd + perfect 5th. Minor chord = Root + minor 3rd + perfect 5th. The key difference is the middle note.

title: Build a G Chord
content: Try building a G chord! G Major = G + B + D. G Minor = G + Bb + D. Click to toggle between major/minor.
